comment: "This was my second pitch and first assignment with this editor. Light edits & no comments giving feedback. All told, the editing process was painless enough, but getting paid required multiple chasing emails after the payment was overdue. In the end, they omitted my wire transfer fee, but I chalk that up to a lesson learned. In the future, I'll make sure to tack that on from the initial conversation."
"The editorial process was fairly straightforward. I'm would gladly write for them again."
paidYet: Haven't gotten it yet (as of this reporting)
